WorkThanks.name: WorkThanks
WorkThanks.description: Represents the source and message of a thanks post.

FeedItemId.description: ID of the FeedItem related to the thanks badge.

GiverId.description: Salesforce user ID for the giver of the Thanks record.

Message.description: Required. Message associated with the Thanks record.

NetworkId.description: The ID of the community that this WorkThanks is associated with. This field is available only if digital experiences is enabled in your org.

OwnerId.description: Salesforce user ID for the owner of the badge record (typically the same user as the giver of the record).
